content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position (y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate factory at position (z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft an item. For example, crafting Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when extracting items from the furnace
- Make sure the furnace has items to extract before attempting to extract them. Check the furnace inventory to confirm it contains the desired items.

### Errors when using crafting machines
- Ensure that the crafting machine is properly set up and has access to all required ingredients. If a recipe requires multiple items, make sure all of them are available in the correct quantities.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.
